name: Drone Striker
storyline: The story tells a war between humanity and artificial intelligence. As modern technology develops, AI robots gradually replaced soldier and police to protect the world. For a time, people and machine harmoniously created an ideal world. However, robots gradually grew self-conscious and determined that human is unsafe for the world. Artificial intelligence started a war against humanity. All AI robots no longer obey human orders. To save the human race, we can only count on ourselves.
summary: An all new futuristic VR shooting game! Classic arcade shooting recreated in VR! A dire apocalyptic world! Surrounded by mecha insectoids! You take the role of Chris, a member of the special unit force called the Drone Strikers who needs to use his combat abilities to save what is left of humanity.
